playlists.title: Sadness is my Only Friend
playlists.description: Woe is me, sad songs only!

playlists.title: It's Sunday Morning, I'm Hungover
playlists.description: No thoughts in this head, only tunes. Songs to zone out to.

playlists.title: I Want to Punch You
playlists.description: I hate everything, bite me. Angry music welcome.

playlists.title: Life is Candy, I am a Child
playlists.description: Happiness is everywhere in the world. Songs about true joy.

playlists.title: I'm a Queen, You're All Peasants
playlists.description: Power in all its genders, I am on top of the world.

playlists.title: The Trees are Calling Out to Me
playlists.description: It's time for a walk! Light, nature feels.
